mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOX_PERMISSION(MEMBER_ID, BOX_NO, MASTER_PER, WRITE_PER, READ_PER, EDIT_PER, DELETE_PER,MEMBER_STAT) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{box_no}, #{master_per}, #{write_per}, #{read_per}, #{edit_per}, #{delete_per}, #{member_stat})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOX_PERMISSION MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}, MASTER_PER = #{MASTER_PER}, WRITE_PER = #{WRITE_PER}, READ_PER = #{READ_PER}, EDIT_PER = #{EDIT_PER}, DELETE_PER = #{DELETE_PER} WHERE BOX_NO = #{box_no}
